content:
I don't have personal experience with the exhibits at the artscience museum, but i can suggest some of its popular exhibitions that you may find interesting to visit:

1. future world: where art meets science: this is one of the permanent exhibitions at the artscience museum, featuring 16 interactive installations that use art, science, and technology to create an immersive, futuristic world.

2. planet or plastic? this exhibition explores the urgent issue of plastic waste in our oceans and its impact on marine life. through a series of installations, visitors can learn about the scale of the problem and ways to tackle it.

3. 2219: futures imagined: this exhibition takes visitors on a journey into the year 2219, presenting a range of speculative visions of the future through immersive installations, films, and artworks.

4. da vinci: shaping the future: this exhibition explores the life and work of leonardo da vinci, highlighting his contributions to science, technology, and art. it features replicas of some of his most iconic inventions as well as interactive installations that allow visitors to explore his ideas in depth.

5. art from the streets: this exhibition showcases the evolution of street art from its beginnings as a subculture to its present-day status as a global art movement. it also features works by some of the world's most renowned street artists.

these are just a few examples of the many exhibitions that the artscience museum has to offer. i'd recommend checking out their website to see what exhibitions will be on display when you plan to visit.
